statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 6 , 18 \, x^{3} + 27 \, x^{2} + 33 \, x - 24 , 4 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 5 \, x + 4 , -7 \, x^{3} - 13 \, x^{2} - 14 \, x + 14 , -x^{2} - 6 \, x + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
